name: For The Queen! (KaaSnake)
description:
My entry for Mini Jam 72 - Adventure!

You play as an alien race of giant insect, defending their home from a human invasion. Your queen is down, and as her loyal servants, you are ready to die for her - and that's exactly what you do!

Your bees have one deadly suicide attack - exploding into acid! And as their body falls, they become an obstacle to slow soldiers down (and can squash enemies it falls on)

Attempt to stop many enemies, and survive as many rounds as possible!

Developed in Unity by KaaSnake

Music composed with Bosca Ceoil by KaaSnake

Pixel-art created in GIMP by KaaSnake

Additional SFX from OmegaPixelArt
